name: The last rise
description:
Disclaimer: The game was made in 3 days for Minijam, and sadly I could't implement the ending I had planned.

Summary:

The ancient scriptures had warned humanity. Today, the sun will set for the very last time.

Few will survive the night, but I stand next to a talisman of creation. I will wait until sunset, and head into the mountain, where it's written the creators will appear to bring the end. Maybe they will listen to our pleas.

Controls:

  • A: Move left
  • B: Move right
  • Space: Jump
  • C: Toss object
  • V: Attack
  • E: Interact with platform
  • R: Restart level (if you get stuck, etc...)

Written in the Nim programming language, source code: https://github.com/tatjam/minijam110
